EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2017.Keynotes + Agenda Live 10-25-17
EmailTemplate.subject: SpringOne Platform Main Stage Speakers + Full Agenda Now Live
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=last discount&utm_medium=email link&utm_campaign=springoneplatform2017]]> 2017 Full Agenda is Now Available Learn how to build transformational software at SpringOne Platform 2017! Collaborate and share knowledge with other cloud experts from leading software companies at SpringOne Platform 2017—the conference designed especially for people like you, who build, deploy, and run cloud-native software.
This year’s event is taking place in San Francisco on December 4-7, and includes 200+ sessions and keynotes, onsite training, and networking opportunities across several events.
Register Today! <[[https://2017.springoneplatform.io/ehome/s1p/registration?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-highlights-q317]]>
Only a few spots left for Steeltoe, Pivotal Cloud Foundry, Spring 5, Spring Cloud Services, Spring Boot, Spring Cloud Data Flow and other pre-conference technical training courses. Level-up your technical skills at SpringOne Platform! <[[https://springoneplatform.io/training?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-schedule-q317]]>
Main Stage Speakers from Boeing, Google, Scotiabank, Microsoft and More <[[https://springoneplatform.io/speakers?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-schedule-q317]]>!

Pivotal, Sr. Director of Technology Cornelia Davis
View the full agenda <[[https://springoneplatform.io/agenda?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-schedule-q317]]> and register <[[https://2017.springoneplatform.io/ehome/s1p/registration?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-schedule-q317]]> today!
We hope to see you there! The SpringOne Platform Team
